languages.text: "Мне плевать на твои интересы, {name}. Ты знаешь, зачем я бродил по проклятым лесам тридцать дней и ночей. Так что не смей портить веселье". {n}Каллигос говорит спокойно, почти тихо. И от того его речь звучит еще более угрожающе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мне плевать на твои интересы, {name}. Ты знаешь, зачем я бродил по проклятым лесам тридцать дней и ночей. Так что не смей портить веселье". {n}Каллигос говорит спокойно, почти тихо. И от того его речь звучит еще более угрожающе.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мне плевать на твои интересы, {name}. Ты знаешь, зачем я бродил по проклятым лесам тридцать дней и ночей. Так что не смей портить веселье". {n}Каллигос говорит спокойно, почти тихо. И от того его речь звучит еще более угрожающе.{/n}

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Me traen sin cuidado sus intereses, {name}. Sabe bien que llevo treinta días con sus noches peinando estos condenados bosques. ¡No se atreva a privarme de esta diversión!». {n}Calligos habla con sosiego, casi en voz baja, lo que confiere un tono aún más ominoso a sus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me traen sin cuidado sus intereses, {name}. Sabe bien que llevo treinta días con sus noches peinando estos condenados bosques. ¡No se atreva a privarme de esta diversión!». {n}Calligos habla con sosiego, casi en voz baja, lo que confiere un tono aún más ominoso a sus palabras.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “我才不管你想知道什么破事，{name}。你知道吗，我在这该死的森林里整整找了三十个昼夜才找到他们。你最好别坏了我的兴致！”{n}卡里戈斯语调平静，几乎毫无波澜，但这却让他的语气更加恐怖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我才不管你想知道什么破事，{name}。你知道吗，我在这该死的森林里整整找了三十个昼夜才找到他们。你最好别坏了我的兴致！”{n}卡里戈斯语调平静，几乎毫无波澜，但这却让他的语气更加恐怖。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Je me moque royalement de ce qui vous intéresse, {name}. Vous savez ce que je pourchasse dans ces maudits bois depuis trente jours et trente nuits, alors je vous déconseille de me gâcher mon plaisir ! » {n}Calligos parle sur un ton calme qui rend ses propos d'autant plus menaçants.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je me moque royalement de ce qui vous intéresse, {name}. Vous savez ce que je pourchasse dans ces maudits bois depuis trente jours et trente nuits, alors je vous déconseille de me gâcher mon plaisir. » {n}Calligos parle sur un ton calme qui rend ses propos d'autant plus menaçants.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「俺はお前の関心など、どうでもいいんだ、{name}。俺がこの呪われた森で、ここ30日間も夜を徹して探し回ってきたことを知っているだろう。楽しみを台無しにするな！」{n}カリゴスは穏やか、かつ静かな口調で言葉を発するが、それが彼の言葉をより不吉なものとしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺はお前の関心など、どうでもいいんだ、{name}。俺がこの呪われた森で、ここ30日間も夜を徹して探し回ってきたことを知っているだろう。楽しみを台無しにするな！」{n}カリゴスは穏やか、かつ静かな口調で言葉を発するが、それが彼の言葉をより不吉なものとしていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Eure Interessen sind mir völlig gleichgültig, {name}. Ihr wisst, wonach ich diese verfluchten Wälder dreißig Tage und Nächte lang abgesucht habe. Wagt es nicht, mir den Spaß zu verderben!" {n}Calligos spricht ruhig, fast leise, was seine Worte noch bedrohlicher klingen lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure Interessen sind mir völlig gleichgültig, {name}. Ihr wisst, wonach ich diese verfluchten Wälder dreißig Tage und Nächte lang abgesucht habe. Wagt es nicht, mir den Spaß zu verderben!" {n}Calligos spricht ruhig, fast leise, was seine Worte noch bedrohlicher klingen lässt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Ne istediğin zerre umurumda değil {name}. Son otuz günümü geceme katarak bu lanet ormanları nasıl arayıp taradığımı biliyorsun. Sakın eğlencemi mahvetmeye kalkışma!" {n}Calligos sakince, hatta neredeyse sessizce konuşuyor. Bu da sözlerine daha da uğursuz bir hava katıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could not care less about your interests, {name}. You know what I have been scouring these cursed woods for these last thirty days and nights. Don't you dare ruin my fun!" {n}Calligos speaks calmly and almost quietly, which makes his words sound even more ominous.{/n}
